## Loading Packages

::: callout-note
In the code chunk, p_load() and
[**pacman**](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/pacman/index.html) package is used to load tidyverse family of packages
::: 

```{r}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse)
```

## Importing Data

```{r}
realis <-read_csv("data/realis2019.csv")
```
## R Graphics vs GGplot

```{r}
ggplot(data=realis, 
       aes(x = `Unit Price ($ psm)`)) +
    geom_histogram()
```
